homePage.title: home
homePage.description:
Hello, I'm BarZ Hsieh. 
Welcome to my personal blog website. I am a software engineer who loves technology, specializing in frontend development with expertise in Nuxt, Vue, TypeScript, and other modern technologies. 
Here you can explore my technical articles and personal projects, and I also share my life through the lens in the Gallery.

blogsPage.title: All Blogs
blogsPage.description:
Welcome to explore my technical blog, where I share personal insights about frontend development and web technologies. 
I cannot guarantee that all content is completely accurate, but I hope you can find some useful information here. 

Occasionally, I also share some of my personal stories and life thoughts.
blogsPage.noResultDescription: We couldn't find any posts matching your search.

projectsPage.title: Projects
projectsPage.description:
Welcome to explore my project portfolio.
Here you'll find work from company collaborations, client projects, to personal experimental side projects.
Innovative solutions built with Vue, Nuxt, TypeScript, and cutting-edge web standards.
projectsPage.noResultDescription: We couldn't find any posts matching your search.

demosPage.title: Demos
demosPage.description:
This section mainly showcases experimental and interesting applications, along with personal development practice projects. I aim to explore new technologies and test creative ideas to expand the possibilities of my web development skills.

I believe that utilizing modern web technologies can create more innovative and practical user experiences.

galleryPage.title: Gallery
galleryPage.description:
“ Photography is an elegant way of collecting; through it, we gather the world, memories, and life stories captured in light and shadow. „ 

Travel adventures, everyday moments, cherished memories.
Beyond the world of programming and development, I hope to share more of my life through the language of photography.
